title: Electrochemistry

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose to Indulge. While Indulging, any players who visit you will be informed of the strange lightning running through your body.
- During the day, you may Rush a player, dealing a powerful attack to them immediately. 0 Uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While you control The Psychopath, you gain a charge of Rush if no one visits you tonight.
- After Indulging, you gain a charge of Rush.
Kill Note Addition:
*"The thrill - I need it - I chase it"*

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure only you and your emotions remain.

desc:
Post 4976
*Understand your most intense desires. Let your body enjoy it.*
